text: Ni nganitutumisyeje ntenga jwalijose ikaaŵeje kuti akundidweje kwa lisosa lya Allah. Sano ŵanganyao pandema jaŵalitendele lupuso achimisyene, ingaŵe ŵam’bichilile (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) ni kum'benda Allah chikululuko, nombe najo Ntenga ﷺ nikwaŵendela chikululuko, chisimu chene angansimene Allah ali Jwakupochela nnope toba, Jwachanasa channope
